Interface WorkflowEventRequestDAO

    • Method Detail

      • addApproversOfRequest

        String addApproversOfRequest(String taskId,
                             String eventId,
                             String workflowId,
                             String approverType,
                             String approverName)
        Add who approves the relevant request.
        Parameters:
        taskId - random generated unique Id.
        eventId - the request ID that need to be checked.
        workflowId - workflow ID.
        approverType - the type of the approved user EX: user or Role.
        approverName - the value of the approver type.
        Returns:
        event ID.

      • getApproversOfRequest

        String getApproversOfRequest(String eventId)
        Get taskId from table.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the request ID that need to be checked.
        Returns:
        task Id.

      • getApproversOfCurrentStep

        String getApproversOfCurrentStep(String eventId)
        Get approverName related to currentStep.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the request ID that need to be checked.
        Returns:
        the value of the approver type.

      • deleteApproversOfRequest

        void deleteApproversOfRequest(String taskId)
        Delete approver details using task Id.
        Parameters:
        taskId - random generated unique Id.

      • createStatesOfRequest

        void createStatesOfRequest(String eventId,
                           String workflowId,
                           int currentStep)
        Add what step to approve.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the request ID that need to be checked.
        workflowId - workflow ID.
        currentStep - the current step.

      • getStateOfRequest

        int getStateOfRequest(String eventId,
                      String workflowId)
        Returns the current step given the event ID and workflow ID.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the request ID that need to be checked.
        workflowId - workflow ID.
        Returns:
        current step value.

      • updateStateOfRequest

        void updateStateOfRequest(String eventId,
                          String workflowId,
                          int currentStep)
        Updates a state of request given the event ID, workflow ID and current step.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the request ID that need to be checked.
        workflowId - workflow ID.
        currentStep - the current step.
